summary: The 'Punishing Illegal Immigrant Felons Act of 2025' amends the Immigration and Nationality Act. It increases penalties for non-citizens who illegally enter the U.S. and commit crimes. Specifically, the bill extends prison sentences for those who are convicted of crimes and improperly enter the country, as well as those who are convicted of crimes after being previously removed. The bill also revises the conditions under which aggravated felonies are treated.
